channel.title: Somebody please help me!
channel.description:
i have 2 questions.
my first question is how can I add the emote of custom item? Cause when i fight it while it i am wielding it just fights with his hands.
my second question is how do I add custom shops?

item.title: Somebody please help me!
item.dc:creator: @m4ul_tw1nz m4ul tw1nz
item.description:
@m4ul_tw1nz wrote:

U need add an Npc like “bob” or “Niles”

U can add them here:

317 : AutoSpawn.CFG
508 : NpcSpawn.CFG

Example:
NpcID Coords Coords Height idk idk idk idk NpcName

spawn = 498 2602 3165 0 0 0 0 0 Banker

Read full topic
